body: Join us on mczone02.avic.us for nebual fun. we need more players to make it more fun for us. it works and isnt lagging (i know surprise to me too)

title: Join mczone02.avic.us for some Nebuala fun!!!

replies.body: Come join us were in mczone01 now if you cant join directly with mczone01.avic.us then join mczone02.avic.us then do /Server mczone01
